_sText:
LOOKS PLAIN BUT IS ALOT OF FUN!!!!!!
ITS SO FUN BECAUSE U SLIDE EVERYWERE AND U GOTA SHOOT YA ENEMY'S WHILE FLYING HEAPS FAST IN THE AIR 
GOOD LUCK DODGING THE EXPLODABLE BARRELS :)

ever get borred of normal maps
well this map is for u.
the friction is -1
and gravity is 200
u fly around the map with shotguns with ammo
good little map
LOTS of fun
recomended to have heaps of people play it
Secret is to jump alot to kill the enemy's :)

thx leave wat u think of it
